sentences.sContent: I think containerization is one of the best loading methods at present.
sentences.sContent_eng: I think containerization is one of the best loading methods at present.
sentences.sCn: 我认为集装箱运输是目前的最佳运输方式之一。

sentences.sContent: The containerization of railway freightage is an important means of enhancing the efficiency of railway transportation.
sentences.sContent_eng: The containerization of railway freightage is an important means of enhancing the efficiency of railway transportation.
sentences.sCn: 铁路货物运输的集装箱化是提高铁路运输效率的重要手段。
